thread.title: 23 Things Everyone Who's 25 Now Did When Then Were 15
thread.title_full: 23 Things Everyone Who's 25 Now Did When Then Were 15

author: Flo Perry
title: 23 Things Everyone Who's 25 Now Did When Then Were 15
text:
View this image ›
buzzfeed.com ID: 10385782 2. … or a preppy phase that involved a lot of Abercrombie and Hollister. View this image ›
Twitter: @DanDiGiacomo ID: 10385788 3. If you were an emo you were all about Claire’s clip in pink hair extensions. View this image ›
beautybestfriend.com Of course you never admitted you were an emo at the time, but looking back it was painfully obvious.
ID: 10385823 4. You probably had an extensive collection of studded belts. View this image ›
Twitter: @RallyIcon Sometimes you’d wear multiple belts layered over each other.
ID: 10385831 5. And you definitely wrote some meaningful stuff on the soles of your Converse. View this image ›
Twitter: @girlvlmghty ID: 10385862 6. If you were more preppy in 2007 you probably had a mild addiction to gradual tanning lotion. View this image ›
aisforayla.blogspot.co.uk ID: 10385875 7. You tried to make your nails look like this with just Tip-Ex. View this image ›
Twitter: @nailsbynilla ID: 10385887 8. And you definitely tried out using concealer as lipstick at least once. Twitter: @meganrhianne
duckometer.com
 ID: 10385961 9. No matter what side of the divide you were on you spent days of your life straightening your hair. View this image ›
Twitter: @Wee_Mick ID: 10386327 10. You spent hours customising your MySpace so it truly reflected your personality. View this image ›
myspace.com You would get so angry if someone you knew stole your song.
ID: 10386346 11. You wore your thong so that it always showed above your trousers. View this image ›
Getty Images ID: 10386578 12. This combo was a go-to outfit for you for almost all weathers and occasions. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @mandytoes Maybe you’d swap your denim mini for a rara skirt if it was for a cinema date.
ID: 10387013 13. You tried to cram as much information about your love life into your MSN name as possible. View this image ›
Twitter: @MSNmesenger ID: 10387711 14. You used these hairclips to give yourself a whole new style. View this image ›
claires.co.uk ID: 10387754 15. And thought Skins was the most outrageous TV program ever. View this image ›
E4 And wished your life was that exciting.
ID: 10387765 16. You listened to songs your friends downloaded from Limewire on your iPod nano. View this image ›
Twitter: @wondrlandswift ID: 10387815 17. You tried to convince your parents to buy you a Blackberry because then you could BBM for free, instead of texting. View this image ›
Twitter: @_anginlalu_ Really you just wanted to PING everyone you knew.
ID: 10387830 18. If you wanted to look “indie” you’d wear a t-shirt with this exact font on it. View this image ›
weheartit.com You’d say it was vintage when really you’d spent all your allowance on it at Urban Outfitters.
ID: 10387875 19. If you wanted to look sophisticated you’d wear a pashmina. View this image ›
Flickr: katietegtmeyer Maybe you “borrowed” it from your mum.
ID: 10387897 20. You knew that shrugs were the perfect solution to keeping warm in a smart/casual environment. View this image ›
Gene Blevins / Getty Images ID: 10388071 21. All your jeans had to be skinny, super low rise, pre-faded, and preferably slightly too long for you. View this image ›
ebay.co.uk All the hottest boys wore their jeans halfway down their bum.
ID: 10393345 22. You wore ballet pumps, no matter what the weather conditions were. View this image ›
Twitter: @steph_williams Luckily it was actually totally acceptable to wear them with socks though.
ID: 10393384 23. And whatever your style your eyeliner had to go all the way around your eye. Carlo Allegri / Getty Images, Mark Mainz / Getty Images It made your eye gunk black all the time.
ID: 10386600
Flo Perry is an editor for BuzzFeed and is based in London.
